name: Tied (GrimTurkeys)
description:
"A King is supposed to rule the whole kingdom, it is his sole duty that everyone in the country is well taken care of and growing. But the King is exhausted, thus he chose to wander and clear his mind climbing the highest pillars through the use of his crown. "

Him and the crown are bound by a curse. Where ever the crown goes he goes.

Genre: Endless 3D Platformer Game
Platform: PC
Developed By: Grim Turkeys
Submitted To: SEA Game JAM+ 2021

[Controls]
Mouse  -  For throw direction.
Space [Hold] -  To charge throw.
Space [Release] - To throw.
